Functional Need Category: Sensory

13 functional needs:

  • Limited gustatory
  • Limited hearing
  • Limited hearing and Limited vision
  • Limited olfactory
  • Limited tactile sensitivity
  • Limited vestibular awareness
  • Limited vision
  • No hearing
  • No hearing and Limited vision
  • No vision
  • No vision and Limited hearing
  • No vision and No hearing
  • Sensory sensitivity
